data.description: Rare opportunity for a charming 3 bed 2.5 bath updated home located hillside in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Glendale, Adams Hill. Centrally located in close proximity to Los Feliz, Atwater Village, Eagle Rock, Silver Lake and downtown Glendale, this stylish home sits on a gorgeous tree lined residential street. You will be wowed with the amazing curb appeal and tastefully designed landscaping. Walk to the cute outdoor entry area and you will enter a spacious light and bright home with charming character features like the raised arched ceiling and arched entry to the kitchen.  The oversized living room has plenty of space for your family enjoyment and entertainment, facing a charming fireplace. The galley kitchen has plenty of cabinets and nicely sized granite countertop space and newer stainless steel appliances. The charming dining nook next to the kitchen and living room faces the beautiful street and greenery. Some of the other features of this updated home include upgraded windows, tile flooring, recessed lighting, copper plumbing, central air & heat, fire sprinkler system throughout the entire house and garage, private laundry room with a sink, storage space and much more. The oversized master suite has plenty of room for lounging area, nicely sized walk in closet and full bath. The two other bedrooms are very good sized with plenty of closet space. All three bedrooms have direct access to the rear balcony and a spacious, private and lush backyard. The park-like backyard has a large grass area, fruit trees and room for a pool and or an ADU (buyer to verify with the city). The wide driveway leads to a finished two-car garage with direct access and lots of additional storage space. This home is in close proximity to the freeways and a short drive to Pasadena, Burbank, DTLA and the San Fernando Valley. Don't miss this opportunity on this amazing home in a highly desirable neighborhood with very limited inventory, Glendale school district, community college and local parks.  Enjoy NELA shopping, entertainment and dining including Little Ripper, Dunsmoor, Capri Club, The Grant, Bub and Grandma's and LoQ, Art's Pastry and kitchen and much more!
